title: 2.1 Master Challenge 3
question:
Write a program to check the following standard baggage weight (in kg) allowed by the XYZ Airlines as cabin baggage and check-in baggage. Users input the baggage weights in this case.

Compare the user inputs with the baggage allowance and calculate if there are any extra charges to be paid. Excess baggage is charged at the rate of 5$ per kg for cabin baggage and 2$ per kg for check-in baggage.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
